name: blog-application
description: Blog application with frontend, backend, and Next.js

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:nextjs
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:nextjs
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:nextjs
scripts.format:all: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && npm run format:nextjs
scripts.format:check:all: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend && npm run format:check:nextjs
